tool_description: decent collection of pizzas and desserts for your next food app project..
name: Pizza and Desserts
title: Pizza and Desserts

api_list.name: Get specific pizza
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pizza-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/pizzas/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pizza-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pizza-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/pizzas/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pizza-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
